metadata.synopsis: This triggers when an NPC detects the player has placed a Rune of Warding. Those include the sleep and thunder ones. The NPC must have succeeded in a skill check in order to notice this, and will then react to the player.
metadata.how_to_trigger: roll amazingaddDebugSpell Target_GlyphOfWardingcast the spell on/near an NPC
